title: Lunar Revel Sales Bug
body: So when i first went into the lunar revel shop thing and clicked my 6 skins, one of them was hired gun lucian (one of my favorite skins). So i close it and play a game, then after that game i decide i will buy it (40% off i think) but when i get into shop the place it was in was closed as if i had never clicked it. and so i clicked and and the skin changed :((((((((( anyone else get this? looks like i cant get my favorite skin :(
